header_text: You've had a few falls lately around the house and in the garden. Your spouse and child meet with you to talk about this. You can see from the looks on their faces they're worried.

elements.text: They talk with you about using a cane or walker so that you can be more sturdy on your feet, and you agree. Seeing their faces relax makes you...
